events.message: I received my order today, but the product has a large scratch on the screen and does not look new at all.
The reported issue involves a product defect related to visible damage on delivery.
The case has been assigned to a customer support specialist for further assistance regarding the damaged item.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the scratch on your product. I'll do my best to help you resolve this issue quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and the packaging so we can better understand the extent of the damage?
I have sent you pictures showing the scratch on the screen as well as the box. The packaging also looks slightly crushed.
Thank you for the photos. We are happy to offer you a replacement unit at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I appreciate the quick response and would like to go ahead with the replacement option, please.
Your replacement order has been processed and shipped today. You should receive it within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement product and that it meets your expectations.
Yes, I received the replacement unit and it is in perfect condition. Thank you for your help and prompt service.
We are glad to hear that the replacement arrived in perfect condition. Closing this case now, and feel free to contact us anytime.
